comment: Editing my review after 3 years: They have made it mandatory to purchase a premium subscription to skip to your favorite part of a song, and you can't replay it while playing. These are basic features of a music app, but now you have to pay for them. So bad. Free music with ads is still tolerable and understandable, but this stunt is so cheap. I have been using Spotify for about 3 years and considered it the finest music app. But no, it's absolutely disgusting now. Uninstalling it on the way.
